name: Bubble Battle
description:
A competitive game about growing bubbles to take more space on the board than your opponent. If you collide with an opponent their bubbles will shrink, but if you collide with your own your bubble will stop growing. Keep going until you fill up the board. Towards the end if you get stuck then hints may appear.

Change the colour of your bubbles, or add patterns in the options menu.

Control with the mouse only, growing bubbles either with a single click or hold, changeable in the options menu.

Tutorial available in the options menu that changes depending on the control scheme.
